title: Gothic 1

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes:
Running mostly fine on Ubuntu 18.04 default gpu drivers, no external ppa needed.

Couple of issues:
- No music in menu and in game (other sounds work fine), reported here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/65540/Gothic_1/
- Likes to freeze after first couple of minutes on my system, after killing process and running game again works fine
- Crashed from time to time with windows-like window showing exception error, unfortunately I haven't logged it
systemInfoNotes: Secondary GPU is AMD R7 M270 (detected by system as M265), Dell Inspiron 7548. Game is actually running on radeon GPU (using command DRI_PRIME=1 %command%)
